name: engine
def: define engine { fm 0 150 am 0 100 triangle 100:50 square 39 engine_speed } reverb 10:50 engine

name: fm slow freq
def: fm 60 140 { fm 60 140 generator sinus 800 sinus 10 } sinus 1

name: fm mod mod
def: fm 60 140 { fm 60 140 modulator sinus 800 sinus 10 } sinus 1

name: fm mod both
def: fm 60 140 { fm 60 140 both sinus 800 sinus 10 } sinus 1

name: comlex env
def: envelope 10000 once data 0 100 75 50 25 0 end fm 60 140 { fm 60 140 modulator square 880 sinus 50 } sinus 10

name: env whitenoise
def: am 100 100 envelope 2000 once data 50 100 20 10 0 end wnoise sinus 1000
